mean_cn: n.老套的模式，陈规；  v.对……产生成见
mean_en: a fixed idea or image that many people have of a particular type of person or thing, but which is often not true in reality
sentence: There are three typical stereotypes of South Korean TV shows.
sentence_trans: 韩剧有三种经典的套路。
word_etyma: stereo立体 + type模式 → stereotype陈规，老套
